doc.after: According to their shared physical and chemical properties the elements can be classified into the major categories of metals metalloids and nonmetals Metals are generally shiny highly conducting solids which form alloys with one another and salt like ionic compounds with nonmetals other than the noble gases The majority of nonmetals are coloured or colourless insulating gases nonmetals that form compounds with other nonmetals feature covalent bonding In between metals and nonmetals are metalloids which have intermediate or mixed properties 21
